name: Empowered Surge
entries: Starting at 10th level, your Energy Surge gains additional benefits:

entries.name: Speed
entries: While in speed stance, when you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

entries.name: Power
entries: While in power stance, you gain advantage Saving Throws against effects you can see.
